import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipeListComponent { recipes:Recipe[] = [ new Recipe("") ]; }
